headline: 3 Stocks to Buy From the Prospering Electric Power Industry
summary: Expected rise in production to meet demand, along with an increase in electricity prices, bodes well for the prospect of the Utility-Electric Power industry. Top-ranked utilities like CNP, FTS and NI are set to benefit from strong demand from their customer base.

headline: NiSource Q2 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Rise Y/Y
summary: NI's second-quarter earnings per share are better than expected. The company sells a higher volume of electricity in the reported quarter.

headline: NiSource (NI) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: NiSource (NI) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +4.76% and +11.51%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: NiSource: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: NI) on Wednesday reported earnings of $102.2 million in its second quarter. On a per-share basis, the Merrillville, Indiana-based company said it had net income of 22 cents. The energy holding company posted revenue of $1.28 billion in the period.
